===Etymology===
Probably an Old Chinese transcription of an original Baiyue name, but [[folk etymology|folk etymologized]] as deriving from [[禹]][[航]] (''Yǔ Háng'', "[[w:Yu the Great|Yu]]'s [[ferry]]").
